title: ArtyTorrent Pack 35-Jungle Drum Loops-160-169bpm-WAV samples
description:
ArtyTorrent Pack 35-Jungle Drum Loops-160-169bpm-WAV samples
------------------------------------------------------------

This pack is a companion to no.34, inspired by requests for some 2-step drum loops.
Included are loops for the Jungle/Drum n&#039; Bass genres with the majority in this pack using more "live"-sounding acoustic drum sounds. Here we have variations on the old Amen break, and other recycled soul and funk samples. The tempo is obviously up in the 160bpm range.

Torrent contains 4 RAR files.
-----------------------------
Benji&#039;s Jungle Beats 165 (13 loops) 
Desimal Jungle 160-169 (7 loops)
Ground Loops Jungle 160 (64 loops)
Twisted Jungle Beats 160 (11 loops)

All samples are normalized 16-bit Acidized WAVs at 44.1KHz, looped precisely and containing the approx bpm in the filename, ready to be dropped into your own productions, or chopped up and effected as you wish.

The samples are from a variety of sources including CDs produced by Sony/Acid and Zero-G.

--
Arty - "In the jungle, the mighty jungle".
3rd Feb 2008 (Super Sunday - Go Pats!).
